title: SLFP removes Raghavan
body_lines: Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) has removed State Minister Dr. Suren Raghavan from the post of Assistant Secretary of SLFP, Leader of Wanni district and Secretary of International Relations, the party announced today.
Despite the SLFP Parliamentary group decision not to accept any ministerial portfolios and sit as an independent group in Parliament, MP Raghavan was sworn-in as a State Minister.
In a letter to MP Raghavan, SLFP Secretary MP Dayasiri Jayasekera also stated that the SLFP decided to initiate disciplinary action against MP Raghavan.
